name: Airdrop Rush
description:
You are stranded in a zombie infested area. fortunately you have friends in high places, they are willing to drop supplies down to you from said high places. These supplies include ammunition, medical supplies, and most importantly a variety of upgrades for your weapon. They’re doing the best they can, but it’s up to you to survive. these upgrades take time to secure, so you must balance capturing these airdrops with fending off the vicious hordes of zombies.

Controls

  • W - move up
  • A - move left
  • S - move down
  • D - move right
  • Left click - shoot
  • R - reload
  • Space - begin wave
  • Escape - pause/unpause game

Fact sheet:

Developer: Bill Coxon

Platform: Windows

Price: free but donations are appreciated
